metadata.name: A New World Awaits!
metadata.description: In the year 2100, when the need and opportunities collide to inhabit another world in the virgin universe, humans made their move on to the most suitable planet near them! But to their surprise, they learnt a whole a new chapter in their forever small lives! Humans aren't the only beings which exists out there, and in awe of the technology and advancements of the superior beings, they could only ever gaze at it and do nothing more!
